attributes.action: Print some more money instead of taking ours.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It seems quite odd that your country gives you money to trade with, but then wants it all back off you. Therefore we request that if the goverment is running low on money, it simply prints some more (in £50 notes to save money on printing costs etc), and instead spends that.

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
